summary: FUEL TANK LEAKING AT HOSE FITTING.  CRACK IN PLASTIC TANK.  NO REPLACEMENT AVAILABLE DUE TO MANY FAILURES.  BOUGHT CAR NEW AND IT HAS NEVER BEEN IN A WRECK.  SEAT BELTS FAIL TO RETRACT IN REAR SEAT COMPARTMENT.  DEALER FIXED TWICE FOR THE SAME PROBLEM.  CAR IS NOW OUT OF WARRANTY.    *MR    *NLM    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*768008
